chapter.name: Z1_A
chapter.description: Opening Scene. Sonny meets Louis.

chapter.name: Z1_0_1
chapter.description: Meet First Enemy

chapter.name: Z1_0_2
chapter.description: Flavor: Sonny killed a zombie.

chapter.name: Z1_0_3
chapter.description: Sonny starts to wonder what's wrong with him.

chapter.name: Z1_0_4
chapter.description: Sonny learns he is also a zombie.

chapter.name: Z1_1_0
chapter.description: Sonny tries to talk and help the enemy zombies but to no avail.

chapter.name: Z1_2_0
chapter.description: Louis teaches Sonny how to regenerate.

chapter.name: Z1_2_1
chapter.description: After Sonny successfully regenerates.

chapter.name: Z1_2_2
chapter.description: Flavor: What is this feeling? There is strange comfort in ending a life.

chapter.name: Z1_b
chapter.description: Shopkeeper introduces himself and teaches Sonny how to buy items.

chapter.name: Z1_3_0
chapter.description: Flavor: Can't let them slow us down. Take them out!

chapter.name: Z1_3_1
chapter.description: Sonny and Louis hears ZPCI in the distance.

chapter.name: Z1_4_0
chapter.description: ZPCI appears and shoots Louis dead.

chapter.name: Z1_4_P
chapter.description: ZPCI is killed. He expresses how strong Sonny is.

chapter.name: Z1_D
chapter.description: Sonny tries to help Louis but it is too late.

chapter.name: Z1_E
chapter.description: ZPCI reports about the green one.

chapter.name: Z2_A
chapter.description: Intro Narration. Sonny arrives on the beach.

chapter.name: Z2_1_0
chapter.description: Sonny tries to talk to the zombie and kills it.

chapter.name: Z2_1_1
chapter.description: Sonny laments at the fact that he was a zombie and wonders what he was in real life.

chapter.name: Z2_B
chapter.description: Sonny walks over and finds Veradux and decides to help him.

chapter.name: Z2_2_0
chapter.description: Veradux is already in combat. He is shocked that Sonny is a zombie.

Conversation.conversation: Starting to think I'm dead already. This is Grade A nuts. @VO_Veradux_01

chapter.name: Z2_2_1
chapter.description: Veradux explains the Scavengers (they hit harder on bleeding targets).

chapter.name: Z2_2_2
chapter.description: Post fight flavor.

chapter.name: Z2_C
chapter.description: Veradux tries to cheer him up and say they need to find the base camp.

chapter.name: Z2_3_0
chapter.description: Veradux explains the base camp isn't so far away.

chapter.name: Z2_4_0
chapter.description: Veradux explains that the Firespitters can enrage.

chapter.name: Z2_5_0
chapter.description: Sonny asks about Veradux's suit. Is he a robot?

chapter.name: Z2_5_1
chapter.description: Veradux finishes his story about how he got the suit.

chapter.name: Z2_D
chapter.description: They reach the camp. ZPCI has gotten there before they have. They clash.

chapter.name: Z2_7_0
chapter.description: Sonny is defeated. But before the ZPCI can reel him in, he is told to retreat.

chapter.name: Z2_8_0
chapter.description: a very dangerous zombie called Vileclaw has entered the area.

chapter.name: Z2_8_1
chapter.description: Vileclaw uses ENRAGE. Veradux warns Sonny to stun him or brace himself.

chapter.name: Z2_8_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z2_8_3
chapter.description: Vileclaw dies. How can someone so small be so powerful?

chapter.name: Z2_E
chapter.description: Sonny and Veradux considers their options. They need to move into the jungle.

Conversation.conversation: It ain’t no five-star exotic jungle retreat in there, Sonny.

chapter.name: Z3_0_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Word is that what’s left of the things livin' in there…

chapter.name: Z3_1_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z3_A
chapter.description: Meet Herregods

chapter.name: Z3_2_0
chapter.description: Herregods joins Party

chapter.name: Z3_2_1
chapter.description: Herregods and Dux talk

chapter.name: Z3_B
chapter.description: Play tape first time

chapter.name: Z3_3_0
chapter.description: Titans

chapter.name: Z3_C
chapter.description: Dr Herregods gives Sonny the ability to evolve.

chapter.name: Z3_4_0
chapter.description: Sonny can use evolve for the first time in combat. Dr shows him how.

chapter.name: Z3_4_1
chapter.description: Evolutions wear off

chapter.name: Z3_5_0
chapter.description: Meet the Druid and Golem combo.

chapter.name: Z3_6_0
chapter.description: Someone is organizing them. We should find out who is behind this.

chapter.name: Z3_7_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Kid's been sayin' dumb crap since I met him. Now all of a sudden he’s got standards. @VO_Veradux_26

chapter.name: Z3_8_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z3_8_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z3_D
chapter.description: Herregods helps Sonny unlock a new ability tree.HERREGODS

chapter.name: Z4_A
chapter.description: Veradux is surprised why the factory still operates.

chapter.name: Z4_0_0
chapter.description: They meet the first worker zombie.

chapter.name: Z4_0_1
chapter.description: They figure that the workers are taking orders from someone.

chapter.name: Z4_1_0
chapter.description: Grosk greets the team.

chapter.name: Z4_1_1
chapter.description: Veradux points out Shredder's weakness.

chapter.name: Z4_2_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z4_2_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z4_3_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z4_4_0
chapter.description: Grosk introduces his ultimate creation. The War Lizard (Miniboss)!

chapter.name: Z4_4_1
chapter.description: Kara points out its weakness. It has high armor, but its core is unstable

chapter.name: Z4_5_0
chapter.description: Char explains the Mad Bomber. Kill it fast, otherwise it will explode.

chapter.name: Z4_6_0
chapter.description: Char explains the Terminator has a massive attack, but there is a long cooling down.

chapter.name: Z4_6_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z4_B
chapter.description: Carbon talks with Grosk. Asks him how the production is going. Grosk gives Carbon what he wants.

chapter.name: Z4_9_0
chapter.description: Confront Grosk. Exchange small talk and fight.

chapter.name: Z4_9_1
chapter.description: Grosk realizes he will lose, but it is too late. The wheels are already in motion.

chapter.name: Z4_C
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z5_A
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z5_B
chapter.description: They enter the icy forest.

chapter.name: Z5_0_0
chapter.description: Wolves! These ones are trained. And they aren't zombies either.

chapter.name: Z5_1_0
chapter.description: Meet the first zealot.

chapter.name: Z5_X_X_5
chapter.description: Meet Zakk, the witch hunter. Engage in a fight.

chapter.name: Z5_X_X_6
chapter.description: Zakk is defeated and joins the party.

Conversation.conversation: ...even though I may have to kill people I know… and once loved… to get to him.

chapter.name: Z5_C
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z5_2_0
chapter.description: Zakk explains that the wolves get stronger when they are hurt.

chapter.name: Z5_3_0
chapter.description: Zakk tells us about the Frozen God.

chapter.name: Z5_3_1
chapter.description: They are also cursed in another way - they literally hunger for blood.

chapter.name: Z5_4_0
chapter.description: MINI BOSS: Frost Reaper. He will wipe out all zombie and all heretics.

chapter.name: Z5_6_0
chapter.description: A priest of the frozen god! These guys can use a dark ritual on their allies.

chapter.name: Z5_6_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z5_9_0
chapter.description: Zakk warns Sonny that the two healing orbs give him strength.

chapter.name: Z5_9_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z5_9_2
chapter.description: Arcanis unleashes his great power (ultimate)!

chapter.name: Z5_9_3
chapter.description: Arcanis is nearly defeated.

chapter.name: Z5_D
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z6_A
chapter.description: Sonny is glad to be out of the insane forest. This place doesn't look any saner.

chapter.name: Z6_B
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z6_0_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z6_1_0
chapter.description: Celestia believes that technology is art. Giving gifts to the world.

chapter.name: Z6_2_0
chapter.description: When you defeat her creations she is motivated to improve.

chapter.name: Z6_C
chapter.description: Herregods explains that certain strains of zombies were destined to evolve.

chapter.name: Z6_3_0
chapter.description: Meet Blitz Raptor, a dinosaur-mech hybrid. Celestia's finest work.

chapter.name: Z6_4_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z6_4_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z6_D
chapter.description: Celestia says that all men should bow before technology.

chapter.name: Z6_E
chapter.description: Carbon shows himself again. Talks to Celestia..

chapter.name: Z6_F
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z6_9_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z6_9_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z6_9_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z6_G
chapter.description: Herregods is able to again help Sonny unlock a new ability tree. But that's the last one.

chapter.name: Z7_A
chapter.description: Sonny says this looks nothing like a subway station.

chapter.name: Z7_0_0
chapter.description: Baron greets them from his castle. He welcomes the guests.

chapter.name: Z7_2_0
chapter.description: (After some turns) They meet a 'Stone Executioner.' Looks like an old school statue with a massive axe.

chapter.name: Z7_2_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z7_2_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z7_3_0
chapter.description: Meet Mini-boss Count Augustin. He's a sort of a vampire, with two stone guards.

chapter.name: Z7_5_0
chapter.description: Meet Oracle and Dreamweaver. Another greeting from the Baron.

chapter.name: Z7_6_0
chapter.description: Meet Assassin (Plague Doctor). They were originally trying to treat the disease.

chapter.name: Z7_8_0
chapter.description: Baron tells a little more about his past.

chapter.name: Z7_9_0
chapter.description: Meet the Baron. He's protected by a maiden. He's growing stronger each turn.

chapter.name: Z7_9_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z7_B
chapter.description: Baron is defeated. He apologizes and then dies.

chapter.name: Z8_A
chapter.description: That's odd... There's a breach in the tunnel.

chapter.name: Z8_0_0
chapter.description: ZPCI makes contact with Sonny crew.

chapter.name: Z8_0_1
chapter.description: Klima: It's the green one? I want him alive!

chapter.name: Z8_B
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z8_2_0
chapter.description: Mini-boss far sight. She trash talks Char - that she had a lot of potential.

chapter.name: Z8_2_1
chapter.description: far sight: Stop moving. It'll hurt a loss less.

chapter.name: Z8_2_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z8_2_3
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z8_3_0
chapter.description: General: Bring out the Pyro unit! Light them up.

chapter.name: Z8_3_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z8_5_0
chapter.description: Miniboss Klima: Finally, the spiecement delivers itself to my door. Power up biosuit!

chapter.name: Z8_5_1
chapter.description: Herregods: We need to stop him before he gets out of control.

chapter.name: Z8_5_2
chapter.description: Herregods trash talks Klima: I read your book. It's full of crap!

chapter.name: Z8_5_3
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z8_5_4
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z8_6_0
chapter.description: Vendara: What do you hope to accomplish? You're not mindless like the others.

chapter.name: Z8_6_1
chapter.description: Char: You're the blind one, Cpt. You can't see what's going on right under your nose.

chapter.name: Z8_8_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z8_8_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z8_8_2
chapter.description: Char: Your boss, the ZPCI Commander has been your enemy all along.

chapter.name: Z8_8_3
chapter.description: Vendara No you're the bad guys! It can't end like this.

chapter.name: Z8_8_4
chapter.description: NO DESC.

chapter.name: Z8_10_0
chapter.description: You have come a long way, green one. Three captains down already.

chapter.name: Z9_3_1
chapter.description: (If either unit is killed, the other one grows stronger.)

chapter.name: Z9_11_1
chapter.description: Carbon: Even if you can beat me, what then?

chapter.name: Z9_12_2

chapter.name: EPILOGUE
chapter.description: It's been a weird crazy journey.

Conversation.conversation: We’ll find that crater, if it exists. See if there are survivors. @FED_Sonny2
Right… and if there are, start a hippy super zombie community or somethin'? @FED_Veradux4
